title: 30 Acres Bare Land For Sale.(ID.NH2)
details:
Closed to Udugama town
Water and electric available
Direct access to the land
Ideal for cultivate cinnamon or tea
Plenty of labours around the land
Very comfortable roads to Galle and southern highway entrances at Baddegama and Pinnaduwa .

NB:
If you need to inspection it please make an appointment with our realtor. No need brokers please.
